get.summary: Retrieves a list of unique identifiers (IDs) for clients based on the provided request parameters.
get.description:
The "Get" method handles HTTP GET requests to obtain a list of client IDs. It accepts a request model
{rq} to define criteria for the code table query. The method returns a model containing
the list of client IDs based on the provided criteria.

parameters.name: rq.includeBusinessTypes
parameters.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to include business types in the query.

parameters.name: rq.includePropertyTypes
parameters.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to include property types in the query.

parameters.name: rq.lang
parameters.description: sets a value for the language of results.

parameters.name: rq.correlationId
parameters.description: Allows end-to-end correlation of log messages with the corresponding Web service message throughout the processing of the Web service message.

parameters.name: rq.echoToken
parameters.description: A reference for additional message identification, assigned by the requesting host system.

parameters.name: rq.primaryLangId
parameters.description: The primary language preference for the message encoded as ISO 639-3.

parameters.name: rq.retransmissionIndicator
parameters.description: When true, indicates the message is being re-sent after a failure.

parameters.name: rq.timeStamp
parameters.description:
ISO 8601 encoded timestamp indicating the creation date and time of the message.
Format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ - UTC
Example: 2019-08-09T08:12:10+00:00

parameters.name: rq.version
parameters.description: The message version indicated by a decimal value.

parameters.name: hitRq
parameters.description: Request containing information about the hit

CorrelationId.description: Allows end-to-end correlation of log messages with the corresponding Web service message throughout the processing of the Web service message.

EchoToken.description: A reference for additional message identification, assigned by the requesting host system.

PrimaryLangId.description: The primary language preference for the message encoded as ISO 639-3.

RetransmissionIndicator.description: When true, indicates the message is being re-sent after a failure.

TimeStamp.description:
ISO 8601 encoded timestamp indicating the creation date and time of the message.
Format: yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:ssZ - UTC
Example: 2019-08-09T08:12:10+00:00

Version.description: The message version indicated by a decimal value.

Success.description: Indicates that comunication request was ok. This tag when exists make tag Error to be null

Errors.description: This tag inform client that the system cannot handle the request because some error

Warnings.description:
This tag indicates that the request can be:
Request ok with warnings: Exitis tag Success and Warnings
Request not ok because bad request: Tag success null and tag warnigs with all warnings

Casafari.Crm.Api.Dtos.CodeTables.CodeNam.description: Represents a model for code, name, and value pairs.

Id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier associated with the value.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name associated with the value.

CultureId.description: Gets or sets the culture associated with the value.

Includes.description:
Filters used for entities
Attention: Filter by location only works if IncludeAgencies is true

SequenceNmbr.description:
This is used for pagination
Starts with the value 1

MaxResponses.description:
This is the number of properties that are get for each page (SequenceNmbr)
The Max amount of properties that can be get is 100

FreeText.description: Allows to search properties by Title, PropertyType, Locality, City, Address, Zone, Region and Reference
